summary: REVERSED: gemini-3 models ARE VALID and CURRENT. gemini-2.0-* are now legacy. This corrects the previous incorrect fix.
root_cause: Gemini 3 models DO exist in Google AI API. The previous fix incorrectly marked gemini-3 as deprecated when gemini-3-pro and gemini-3-flash are the actual current frontier models.
fixes: Updated schema.json to mark gemini-3-pro and gemini-3-flash as active
Marked gemini-2.0-pro and gemini-2.0-flash as legacy/deprecated
Updated README.md to reflect current model stack
impact: All model routing now uses correct Gemini 3 model names.
